theJungle:PaperFaux.NAME: Paper Faux
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yWeak or #yVulnerable, apply an additional #b
theJungle:PaperFaux.FLAVOR: A silent effigy you found in the forest clearing. It seems to be watching you.

theJungle:SpiritDisease.NAME: Spirit Disease
DESCRIPTIONS: The next non-boss chest will have its relic replaced by a spirit poop.
theJungle:SpiritDisease.FLAVOR: A strange plague from drinking strange water... You don't feel too well..

theJungle:SneckoAutograph.NAME: Snecko Autograph
DESCRIPTIONS: Randomly obtain one of the relics.
Who knew the Merchant was such a big fan of Snecko?

theJungle:WildMango.NAME: Wild Mango
theJungle:WildMango.FLAVOR: A succulent fruit grown within the spire, not meant to be consumed by the untainted.

theJungle:WildStrawberry.NAME: Wild Strawberry
theJungle:WildStrawberry.FLAVOR: A delicious fruit tainted ever so slightly by the blight.
DESCRIPTIONS: but lose that amount of your current HP.

theJungle:WildPear.NAME: Wild Pear
theJungle:WildPear.FLAVOR: Not even this fruit was spared from the blight.
DESCRIPTIONS: but gain #b1 #ySlothful at the start of each combat.

theJungle:BirthdayCakeSlice.NAME: Slice of Birthday Cake
theJungle:BirthdayCakeSlice.FLAVOR: A nice slice of birthday cake to celebrate.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b

theJungle:BirthdayCake.NAME: Birthday Cake of Shame
theJungle:BirthdayCake.FLAVOR: It's tasty, but you feel only shame from eating it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b

theJungle:ParSnip.NAME: Par Snip
theJungle:ParSnip.FLAVOR: Definitely more than your average vegetable, despite the name. Rich in vitamins!

theJungle:ShellPeas.NAME: Shell Peas
theJungle:ShellPeas.FLAVOR: These huge peas actually contain normal-sized peas inside. It has an interesting texture as you chew.

theJungle:Flamango.NAME: Flamango
theJungle:Flamango.FLAVOR: A mango concentrated with a forgotten firepower. Spicy!
DESCRIPTIONS: damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn.

theJungle:Creamberry.NAME: Creamberry
theJungle:Creamberry.FLAVOR: A strawberry filled with natural vanilla cream. Delicious!
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUncommon and #yRare cards in future card rewards are #yupgraded.
